EmailTemplate.name: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform.Reminder 1 Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Webinar Reminder: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech Reminder: Complimentary Live Webinar Tomorrow - EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
The complimentary live webinar "Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?" starts tomorrow. We look forward to your questions and input for our speakers who will provide both the business and user perspectives of the web-based trend in EMS Software.
Webinar attendees receive a promotional code for $25 off their Pinnacle 2012 EMS Leadership Forum Registration.
SPEAKERS: Jay FitchJay Fitch, PhD, Fitch & Associates Dan Voss, TriTech Product Manager
Thursday, April 26, 2012 2:00PM ET l 1:00PM CT l Noon MT l 11:00AM PT
LOGIN DETAILS JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/yzcxpkv AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
Questions? Cheri Lane Marketing Communications Manager cheri.lane@tritech.com
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
